attributes.action: THIS IS A MAIL THAT MAKES ME LOOK DOWN ON UK GOVERMENT AND COUNTRY !!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to all uk people include the royal family, at first i apologize for any harsh words on all UK citizenship. i was cheated by a uk family name Esme Wheeler,Mandy Kaim, Anita Kaim. i try make a police reports thru calling but UK  police officer told me that i had not enough money and forget about my issues. The 2nd was i try make hundreds of emails and they told me no way UK authoroties will and able to help a foreign victims! so what is UK a country it is, humilating! discrimating! racistsm! world top 1st country behave that way! i hope in here some people and anyone who able to tell me what should i do as i m a foreigners and victimize by UK citizens, i dare to judge by the law as let the law decide whether i do lie or not or guilty, but the problem is no single UK authorities willing to help, i just want to get the judicary fair treatment, if i am guilty i am willing to be jail or to be punish under UK law and orders. i hope and really pray hard that somebody from here able to response to me and gave me help or advises that what i need to do and what can i do. otherwise in my eyes UK means united killing.
i really thanks and appreciate if any people response to my query.
May God bless you all, good bye.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
